page.title: 03THINGS TO DO
page.content: MILLOM DOES NOT HAVE A LOT OF PLACES FOR PEOPLE TO GO AND DO THINGS. THERE ARE LOTS OF PUBS BUT NOT MANY PLACES FOR YOUNGSTERS. THERE ARE NO CINEMAS. THERE USED TO BE FILMS SHOWN TWICE A WEEK BUT NOW WE ONLY GET A FILM AT CHRISTMAS. THE PALLADIUM IS USED AS A SORT OF SPORTS HALL. IT IS MARKED OUT FOR BADMINTON AND YOU CAN ROLLER SKATE THERE SOMETIMES. IT IS USED BY THE SCHOOLS FOR PLAYS AND THE LOCAL OPERATIC SOCIETY USE IT FOR SHOWS AND PANTOMIMES. THERE IS A SMALL SWIMMING POOL AT THE LOCAL COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. ALL THE SCHOOL CHILDREN GO DURING THE WEEK AND IT IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC ON SOME SATURDAYS AND OCCASIONALLY DURING THE HOLIDAYS.
